description: Try our easy to follow Steamed Sea Bream With Asian Flavours recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Steamed Sea Bream With Asian Flavours Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs vegetable oil, save 1 tbs for oiling
2 sea bream fillets, about 150 g each

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the ginger and cut into matchsticks. Mix with the lemon grass, garlic, chilli, lime leaf, coriander, fish sauce and oil.
Place each fish fillet on a lightly oiled piece of foil, skin-side down. Pour over the dressing. Fold the foil over tightly to seal, leaving a little air around the fish.
Place the foil packets in a steamer set over simmering water. Cook for 10-15 minutes until the fish is just cooked through. Serve with plain rice.
